info.description: This is the Care-Cordination server API documentation.
info.title: Care-Cordination API

get.description: List all available permissions
List all roles with permission and user counts

post.description: Create a new role with optional permissions

get.description: Get a role by ID with its permissions
Get all permissions assigned to a specific role

post.description: Assign a permission to a specific role

delete.description: Remove a permission from a specific role

post.description: Assign a role to a specific user

delete.description: Remove a role from a specific user

get.description: Get the role assigned to a specific user

post.description: Upload a file attachment

get.description: List all audit logs with optional filters (admin only)

parameters.description: Filter by resource type (client, intake_form, etc)
parameters.name: resource_type

parameters.description: Filter by action (read, create, update, delete)
parameters.name: action

get.description: Get a specific audit log entry by ID (admin only)
Get statistics for audit logs in the last 24 hours (admin only)
Verify the integrity of the entire audit log hash chain (admin only)
Verify the integrity of a range of audit logs (admin only)

post.description: Authenticate user and return access and refresh tokens
Logout user by invalidating the refresh token
Disable MFA for the authenticated user
Verify code and enable MFA for the authenticated user
Generate MFA secret and OTP auth URL for the authenticated user
Verify MFA code using pre-auth token
Refresh access and refresh tokens using a valid refresh token
Reset password for the authenticated user

get.description: List all appointments for an employee

post.description: Create a new calendar appointment

get.description: Get a specific appointment by ID
List all reminders for an employee

post.description: Create a new reminder

get.description: Get a specific reminder by ID
Get a unified list of appointments and reminders for a date range
List all clients with discharge status (both in_progress and completed) with pagination, search, and discharge status filter

parameters.description: Search by client first name or last name
parameters.name: search

parameters.description: Filter by discharge status (in_progress or completed)
parameters.name: dischargeStatus

get.description: Get comprehensive statistics for discharged clients including completed/premature breakdown, completion rate, and average days in care
List all clients currently in care with pagination, search, and care type filter. Returns weeks in accommodation for living care types or used ambulatory hours for ambulatory care.

parameters.description: Search by client first name or last name
parameters.name: search

parameters.description: Filter by care type (protected_living, semi_independent_living, independent_assisted_living, ambulatory_care)
parameters.name: careType

get.description: Get comprehensive statistics for clients currently in care including total count, average days in care, and care type breakdowns

post.description: Move a client from intake form to waiting list by creating a client record

get.description: List all clients on the waiting list with pagination and search

parameters.description: Search by client first name or last name
parameters.name: search

get.description: Get comprehensive statistics for clients on the waiting list including total count, average wait time, and priority breakdowns

post.description: Complete the discharge process for a client. Requires closing and evaluation reports. Client status changes to discharged.

get.description: Get all goals for a specific client

post.description: Move a client from waiting list to in care status

parameters.description: Care start date and optional ambulatory hours
parameters.name: request

post.description: Start the discharge process for a client. Client remains in care with discharge_status = in_progress

get.description: Get distribution of in-care clients by care type
Get list of clients assigned to this coordinator
Get aggregated goals progress for all coordinator's clients
Get incidents for coordinator's assigned clients
Get pending reminders and tasks for the coordinator
Get personal statistics for the coordinator's dashboard summary
Get today's schedule for the logged-in coordinator
Get urgent alerts for the logged-in coordinator's clients
Get critical alerts for the admin dashboard
Get discharge statistics
Get evaluation statistics for all coordinators
Get location capacity statistics with optional limit and sorting

parameters.description: Number of locations to return (default: 4, max: 100)
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Sort order: occupancy_desc, occupancy_asc, name (default: occupancy_desc)
parameters.name: sort

get.description: Get overview statistics for the admin dashboard
Get pipeline statistics showing client journey through the care system
Get today's appointments for the logged-in user
List all employees with pagination and search

parameters.description: Search by first name, last name, or full name
parameters.name: search

post.description: Create a new employee

get.description: Get the employee profile of the currently authenticated user
Get a single employee by their ID with all details

put.description: Update an existing employee's details including password

delete.description: Soft delete an employee by ID

post.description: Record progress logs for all current client goals and schedule the next evaluation.

get.description: List evaluations due within the next 7 days or overdue.
Retrieve all draft evaluations for the logged-in coordinator.

post.description: Create a new draft or update an existing draft evaluation for a client.
post.summary: Save or update a draft evaluation

get.description: Retrieve a draft evaluation by ID with all progress logs.

post.description: Convert a draft evaluation to submitted status and update client's next evaluation date.

get.description: Retrieve all past evaluations and goal progress logs for a specific client.
get.summary: Get evaluation history for a client

get.description: Retrieve the most recent evaluation with all goal progress logs for a specific client.
get.summary: Get last evaluation for a client

get.description: List the last 20 evaluations submitted across all clients.
List evaluations scheduled between 8 and 30 days from now.
Retrieve an evaluation (submitted or draft) by ID with all progress logs.

put.description: Update an existing submitted evaluation's date, notes, and goal progress.

get.description: List all incidents with pagination and search by client name

parameters.description: Search by client first name, last name, or full name
parameters.name: search

post.description: Create a new incident

get.description: Get comprehensive statistics for incidents including counts by severity, status, and type
Get a single incident by ID

delete.description: Soft delete an incident by ID

patch.description: Update an existing incident by ID

get.description: List all intake forms

parameters.description: Search by client first name or last name
parameters.name: search

post.description: Create a new intake form

get.description: Get total count, pending count, and conversion percentage of intake forms
Get an intake form by ID with details
List all location transfers with pagination and search

post.description: Register a new location transfer for a client

get.description: Get comprehensive statistics for location transfers including total count, pending count, approval rate, and status breakdowns
Get a single location transfer with all details
get.summary: Get a location transfer by ID

put.description: Update a pending location transfer (new location, coordinator, or reason)

post.description: Confirm a pending location transfer, updating the client's location and coordinator
Refuse a pending location transfer with a reason

get.description: List all locations with pagination and search

parameters.description: Search by name, postal code, or address
parameters.name: search

post.description: Create a new location

get.description: Get total capacity, capacity used (clients in care), and free capacity across all locations

delete.description: Soft delete a location by ID

patch.description: Update an existing location by ID

get.description: List notifications for the current user with optional filtering

patch.description: Mark all notifications as read for the current user

get.description: Get the count of unread notifications for the current user

patch.description: Mark a single notification as read

get.description: Get a paginated list of referring organizations with optional search

parameters.description: Search term for name, contact person, or email
parameters.name: search

post.description: Create a new referring organization with the provided details

get.description: Get comprehensive statistics for referring organizations including total orgs, orgs with in-care/waitlist clients, and total clients referred

put.description: Update an existing referring organization with partial data

get.description: List all registration forms

parameters.description: Filter by status (pending, approved, rejected, in_review)
parameters.name: status

post.description: Create a new registration form

get.description: Get counts of total, approved, and in-review registration forms
Get a registration form by ID with details

delete.description: Soft delete a registration form by ID

post.description: Exchange JWT for a one-time WebSocket connection ticket

get.description: Establish WebSocket connection for real-time notifications

transferDate.description: or time.Time, but for JSON, string

Bearer.description: Add 'Bearer ' prefix before your JWT token for authentication
Bearer.name: Authorization
